title: NTP Ep. 6 - Healing from Trauma with Carl and Julie Gaede
description:
Carl and Julie have given their lives to helping people find healing and hope in their trauma programs through Tutapona. You will love hearing their story and their advice for how to really forgive past hurts and deeply understand God's love for you.

Learn more about Tutapona and the Gaede's work: tutapona.com
Follow Tutapona on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tutapona/

Thanks to Hooked on Phonics. Get your first month for just one dollar: hookedonphonics.com/MADEFORTHIS
